name: Frayfield
description:
Frayfield is a singleplayer 3rd person shooter action game.Play whatever you want from 3 different maps with 4 different game modes. Join the battle.

🎮[Singleplayer] Map selections and game mode selections are available in single player mode only.

[Warning]

Images from mobile.Since mobile does not work stably, only pc version is available.If game modes and maps are not enabled, please restart the game
